CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 拉；拔出；抽出；拖；吸引；扯；拽；（使车辆）转向；打斜；扳动；拉上；取消；撤销（活动、广告等）；拉伤；划；扭转；（耍手腕）得逞；吃力地运转；将…拖在身后；吸引异性
拉；拉力；牵引力；吸引力；影响力；诱惑；深吸；艰难攀登；一满口（或大口）饮料；一次努力尝试；吸引人的特质；牵引用的工具

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 拉的人，拉具；吸引人的东西，招揽顾客的东西

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指将人或物朝出力者的方向拖，不涉及力的大小，含平稳意味，常作借喻用。
特指用绳子或链条等拖或拉本身无动力或无法使用自身动力的东西。
最普通用词，包含本组其它各词的一些意思，可指朝各个方向拉，侧重一时或突然拉动的动作。
指沿斜坡而上或水平方向缓慢地拖或拉十分沉重的人或物。作借喻时可指把人硬拉扯过来。
指用力拖或拉，不涉及方向，多作航海用词。
多指一阵阵地用力拖或拉，但不一定使被拉的人或物移动。

word_group.brief_definition: 成功完成(困难的事情)；车停靠路边
驶入, 停车；挣得, 赢得；吸引；收集, 使聚集
竭尽全力, 费九牛二虎之力
幕后操纵, 暗中控制
力求做好, 努力向上

bilingual.source: It is hard for John to pull Robert's trailer.
bilingual.target: 约翰拉罗伯特的拖车很难。

bilingual.source: How could the man pull a train with his teeth!
bilingual.target: 那人怎么能用牙齿拉火车！

bilingual.source: To pull their sledges across the frozen Arctic.
bilingual.target: 来拉他们的雪橇穿越冰冻的北极。

bilingual.source: They pull Robin out of the mud.
bilingual.target: 他们把罗宾从泥里拉出来。

bilingual.source: The woman was starting to pull back her control column.
bilingual.target: 那个女人开始拉回她的操纵杆。

bilingual.source: "I'm coming up there to pull you down by the ear."
bilingual.target: “我上去揪你耳朵把你拉下来。”

bilingual.source: To pull him away from the cooker, she hit his arm with a piece of wood.
bilingual.target: 为了把他从炉子旁拉开，她用木头打了他的手臂。

list.abstract: pull，英文单词，及物动词、不及物动词、名词，作及物动词时意为“拉；拔；拖”，作不及物动词时意为“拉，拖；拔”，作名词时意为“拉，拉绳；拉力，牵引力；拖，人名；(法)皮尔；(德、瑞典)普尔”。

yingyinNormal.en: Pull my finger. My hand is messed up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拉我的手指，我的手毁了。

yingyinNormal.en: Pull your pants up, Patrick. We're going home.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把你的裤子拉上去，派崔克。我们回家了。

yingyinNormal.en: Ready. Steady. Go. Come on, boys. Come on, pull. Come on, the girls, pull. I am pulling.
yingyinNormal.zh: 准备！预备！开始！男生，加油。努力，拉。女生，加油。我在拉呀。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on. Just give me your hand, I'll pull you back over.
yingyinNormal.zh: 手伸出来，我拉你。

yingyinNormal.en: I will tie the sack onto the chain here, pull one of the two strings behind you and the sack should disappear up to the top floor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要把袋子口绑在链子上，你身后有两条绳子，拉一条袋子就被拉上去了。

yingyinNormal.en: You did not pull it up. I have to be there in an hour. I'm the best man.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那叫拉上拉链吗？我一个小时就得赶到，我是伴郎。

yingyinNormal.en: Could you pull the curtains open for me? The astronauts from the space shuttle are gonna be on the news.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你帮我把窗帘拉起来好吗？太空人会上电视新闻。

yingyinNormal.en: You don't understand. If we go back, they'll swamp the boat. They'll pull us right down, I'm telling you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不明白，我们回去，船会被挤翻，我们会被拉下去。

yingyinNormal.en: What you're going to do is you're going to stick your thumb down its throat, grab the guts and pull.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你现在要做的是把你的手指伸进它的喉咙，抓住内脏，往外拉。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's pull the crackers. There are paper hats inside. And party trumpets. And jokes. What wobbles in the sky? I don't know. A jetlicopter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们来拉圣诞拉炮吧。你们看哪，这里面有一顶纸帽子。还有派对喇叭。还有一个笑话，什么东西在天空中晃荡？这个我不知道。一架直升机。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's pull the crackers. There are paper hats inside. And party trumpets. And jokes. What wobbles in the sky? I don't know. A jetlicopter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们来拉圣诞拉炮吧。你们看哪，这里面有一顶纸帽子。还有派对喇叭。还有一个笑话，什么东西在天空中晃荡？这个我不知道。一架直升机。

yingyinNormal.en: If you don't like him, just pull me aside after 20 minutes, and say he's not for you, and we'll keep looking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你不喜欢他，20分钟后，拉我到一边说他不适合你，我们就接着找。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello, Mr. Pig speaking. It's Daddy. Oh, hello. I'm stuck. Hello Daddy. Hang on, we'll pull you out. One. Two. Three. Pull. Daddy is a blackberry bush.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好，我是猪爸爸。是爸爸。哦，你好，我卡住了。爸爸，你好。等一下，我们来你出来。一、二、三，拉！爸爸变成黑莓丛了。哈哈哈。

yingyinNormal.en: You'll pull me back out, won't you? Or Clementine will make sure neither of us makes it back. Now. Please.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你会把我拉回来的，对吧？否则克莱门汀会让我们两个都回不去，开始吧，拜托了。

yingyinNormal.en: All right fine. Fine, I'll do it. I've just got to get this off the screen. Carol and Susan are still upset that you taught him pull my finger.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，让我来，我们得把这个消掉，卡萝还在气你教他“拉我的手指”。

yingyinNormal.en: Sameen risked everything at the Stock Exchange, not just to save our lives, but to pull the whole world back from the brink of disaster.
yingyinNormal.zh: 萨姆恩在证交所付出了一切，不仅救了我们的命，还把整个世界从灾难边缘拉回来。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not funny! Well, it does look a bit funny. We'll have to pull you out. Peppa's friends are helping to free her. Hurray!
yingyinNormal.zh: 这一点都不好笑！看上去确实有点好笑。我们必须把你拉出来。佩奇的朋友们都来帮忙了。好嘞。

yingyinNormal.en: Then simply sit, spin, stand, stretch. Maybe unloosen your pants. And step, grab, tiny pivot, pull, and you're there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后坐下，旋转，站起，跨一大步……也许要把裤子松一松。然后……并腿，抓床，略微转身，用力一拉，到了。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, that seems simple enough. Point bag away from home, feet firmly on ground, pull string, releasing the winds. All right, let's do it for real.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看上去很简单吗。把袋子指向家的反方向，站稳了，拉绳子把风放出来。好的，来做一遍吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Boys are against girls. When I say go, you must pull the rope with all your strength. The girls will win. No, they won't. The boys will win.
yingyinNormal.zh: 男女大对抗。听到我说开始以后，你们就使劲拉绳子。女生会赢的。你们不会赢，我们男生会赢。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 拉; 拽; 扯; 拖
(pull...from...) 取出; 拿出; 掏出

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 把…拉（过来）；把…扯（过来）；吸引；拔；拖；（pull的现在分词）

word_family.mean: v. 把…拉；把…扯；稳步移动；促使…资助；吸引；取消；撤销；击；侧翼迂回阻挡

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 成功完成(困难的事情)；车停靠路边

examination_example.sentence: This one may be a bit more difficult to <highlight>pull</highlight> off, but it can go a long way to achieving results.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一个可能有点难完成，但它可以对实现结果有很大帮助。

examination_example.sentence: And what's the best way to <highlight>pull</highlight> off one that enhances our goals?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 实现我们目标的最好方法是什么？

sense_info_list.zh: 拉; 拽; 扯; 拖

examination_example.sentence: John Hagel, author of The Power of <highlight>Pull</highlight> and other books, says Brynjolfsson and McAfee miss the reason.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《拉动力》等书的作者John Hagel说，布林约尔弗森和迈克菲没有找到原因。

sense_info_list.en: remove something from a place by pulling

examination_example.sentence: They grow and thrive, restoring the forest's capacity to <highlight>pull</highlight> carbon from the air.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们生长茁壮，恢复了森林从空气中吸收碳的能力。

examination_example.sentence: Rather than <highlight>pulling</highlight> students back, a gap year pushes them ahead by preparing them for independence, new responsibilities and environmental changes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 间隔年不是让学生退学，而是通过让他们为独立、新的责任和环境变化做好准备来推动他们前进。

sense_info_list.en: something exerting an influence or attraction
cancel or withdraw an entertainment or advertisement

sense_info_list.zh: (pull...from...) 取出; 拿出; 掏出

word_usage.usage: pull作名词，表示“拉；拽”时，通常没有复数形式，其前可加不定冠词a/an，其后常接表示接触点或面的介词at或on，如：a pull on the rope，有时还可表示“抽(一口烟)，喝(一口酒)”。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 把…拉；把…扯；稳步移动；促使…资助；吸引；取消；撤销；击；侧翼迂回阻挡

examination_example.sentence: Your time is better spent connecting with people who are at Positions 6 and 8, gradually <highlight>pulling</highlight> them in your direction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你的时间最好花在联系处于6号和8号位置的人上，逐渐把他们拉向你的方向。

sense_info_list.en: remove something from a place by pulling
cancel or withdraw an entertainment or advertisement

examination_example.sentence: Today, federal agencies are <highlight>pulling</highlight> the island fox from the Endangered Species List.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，联邦机构正将岛狐从濒危物种名单中删除。

word_usage.usage: pull oneself together的意思是“控制感情，振作精神”；pull together的意思是“齐心协力”。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The big American myth is that you can <highlight>pull</highlight> yourself up by your own efforts and change a bad situation into a good one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国的一个了不起的神话是，你可以通过自己的努力改善生活，把糟糕的情况变成好的情况。

sense_info_list.en: remove something from a place by pulling

examination_example.sentence: She finally led me to a corner of the library where she <highlight>pulled</highlight> an oversized book off the shelf.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，她带着我来到图书馆的一个角落，从书架上抽出一本超大号的书。

sense_info_list.en: cancel or withdraw an entertainment or advertisement

word_usage.usage: pull oneself together的意思是“控制感情，振作精神”；pull together的意思是“齐心协力”。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>pulls</highlight> out a special device, points it at the suspect, and switches it on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他拿出一个特殊的装置，对准嫌疑人，打开开关。

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>pulled</highlight> and bit the wire.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他又拉又咬电线。

examination_example.sentence: I can, from my computer at home, <highlight>pull</highlight> up satellite images of Juan's village.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我可以用家里的电脑调出Juan所在村庄的卫星图像。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 拉; 拖; 拉伤; 拔出; 抽出

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 把…拉（过来）；把…扯（过来）；吸引；拔；拖；（pull的现在分词）

word_family.mean: v. 把…拉；把…扯；稳步移动；促使…资助；吸引；取消；撤销；击；侧翼迂回阻挡

sense_info_list.zh: 拉; 拖; 拉伤; 拔出; 抽出

examination_example.sentence: Gravity <highlight>pulls</highlight> down cold air, and warm air rises.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 重力把冷空气拉下来，暖空气上升。

examination_example.sentence: To avoid toothache, they had their teeth <highlight>pulled</highlight> out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了避免牙痛，他们拔掉了牙齿。

examination_example.sentence: She was in a long dress and had a hat <highlight>pulled</highlight> down low over her eyes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她穿着长裙，把帽子拉得低低的，遮住了眼睛。

examination_example.sentence: It is important for the whole world to <highlight>pull</highlight> together against COVID-19.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 全世界齐心协力抗击新冠肺炎是很重要的。

examination_example.sentence: As long as we <highlight>pull</highlight> together, we'll make it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只要我们齐心协力，我们就能成功。

examination_example.sentence: If we all <highlight>pull</highlight> together, our China dream are sure to come true.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们齐心协力，我们的中国梦一定会实现。

examination_example.sentence: The windows and doors come from old buildings around her town that were <highlight>pulled</highlight> down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 窗户和门来自她的城镇周围被拆除的旧建筑。

examination_example.sentence: He bought a house there over 30 years ago, but in 2010 the village was to be <highlight>pulled</highlight> down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他30多年前在那里买了一套房子，但2010年这个村庄就要被拆除了。

examination_example.sentence: So far, the hybrid rice he developed has pulled millions of people out of hunger all over the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到目前为止，他研制的杂交水稻使全世界数百万人摆脱了饥饿。

examination_example.sentence: So far, the hybrid rice he developed has <highlight>pulled</highlight> millions of people out of hunger all over the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到目前为止，他研制的杂交水稻使全世界数百万人摆脱了饥饿。

examination_example.sentence: Zhang Guishun encouraged his villagers to do their best to <highlight>pull</highlight> themselves out of poverty.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 张桂顺鼓励村民尽最大努力脱贫。

examination_example.sentence: "Is Michael Peterson the one who always <highlight>pulled</highlight> pranks on us?"
examination_example.sentence_trans: "迈克尔·彼得森是那个总是对我们恶作剧的人吗？"

examination_example.sentence: No way was I going to let him <highlight>pull</highlight> a prank — ruining someone's Valentine's Day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我绝不会让他搞恶作剧——破坏别人的情人节。

word_usage.usage: pull oneself together的意思是“控制感情，振作精神”；pull together的意思是“齐心协力”。
